formats.description: List of formats that are available for this texture set

enum-description.per-node: Textures are per-node and located at `/layers/0/nodes/{resource_id}/textures/{index}` where `{index}` is `this.formats[i].index`
enum-description.per-layer: Texture is shared (i.e. 'global' for the layer) and located at `/layers/0/shared/textures/{index}` where `{index}` is `this.formats[i].index`

examples.title: Per node texture set definition
examples.description: For a mesh with `resource_id=888`, JPEG will be at `/layers/0/nodes/888/textures/0` and DDS at `/layers/0/nodes/888/textures/1`
